title: Day Trips from the Lehigh Valley
text:
FILE PHOTO / THE MORNING CALL Visit the Flight 93 memorial and other Pittsburgh area sites on the trip offered by Lehigh Valley Active Life. Visit the Flight 93 memorial and other Pittsburgh area sites on the trip offered by Lehigh Valley Active Life. (FILE PHOTO / THE MORNING CALL)

OVERNIGHT TRIPS 
• San Antonio, Mission San Jose, the Alamo, LBJ Ranch, Mayan Dude Ranch, May 22-26. $1,819. British Landscapes, England, Scotland, Wales, Edingurgh Castle, Stonehenge, Sept. 3-12. $3,899. School Retirees, Joanne, 610-398-0981.
